metadata.title: CVE-2022-4899 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in zstd v1.4.10, where an attacker can supplyempty string as an argument to the command line tool to cause bufferoverrun.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4899` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzstd1 - 1.5.4+dfsg2-4
zstd - 1.5.4+dfsg2-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libzstd package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4+dfsg2-4').
